attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want Tony Blair and the British Government to address the issue of human traffiking that is currently happening worldwide. What is he doing? There are 1.2 million children involved alone and this is the fastest growing industry involving over 2.4 million people. Please sign the petition to bring this to the forefront of our politics.

rejection.details: There are other petitions which overlap with this one e.g. http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/human-trade/ Please consider signing one of these before opening a new one.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
